scripts.local:dev: npm run extension:local:dev & npm run content:local:dev
scripts.extension:local:dev: npm i && NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=dev node build-manifest.js && NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=dev npx webpack serve --config webpack.config.js
scripts.content:local:dev: cd src/content-app/ && npm i && npm run local:dev
scripts.local:prod: npm run extension:local:prod & npm run content:local:prod
scripts.extension:local:prod: npm i && NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=prod node build-manifest.js && NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=prod npx webpack serve --config webpack.config.js
scripts.content:local:prod: cd src/content-app/ && npm i && npm run local:prod
scripts.build:dev: npm run content:build:dev && npm run extension:build:dev && cd build/extension-build-dev && zip -r ../extension-build-dev.zip . && cd ../../
scripts.extension:build:dev: npm i && NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=dev node build-manifest.js && NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=dev npx webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.content:build:dev: cd src/content-app/ && npm i && npm run build:dev && cd ../../
